text: A bowling alley (also known as a bowling center, bowling lounge, bowling arena, or bowling club) is a place where people can play one of the varying forms of bowling. The term bowling alley can also refer to the bowling lane or lanes themselves. Bowling alleys can be in dedicated bowling venues, part of larger public entertainment facilities (either on their own or part of a housing development or resort hotel), or they can be located in high-end private dwellings. ==References== ==Other websites== *U.S. Bowling Alleys Database Category:Sports buildings
title: Bowling alley
